reference.shortdesc: The colspec element contains a column specification for a table, including assigning a column name and number, cell content alignment, and column width.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: (without the Metadata attribute group), base from the , and the attributes defined below. This element also uses align, char, charoff, colsep, rowsep, and rowheader from .

dlentry.dd: Indicates the number of a column in the table, counting from the first logical column to the last column.

dd.ph: Specifies a name for the column defined by this element. The entry element can use colname to refer to the name of this column.
